Title: The Adventures of Tintin
Writer: Hergé (based on "The Adventures of Tintin" by), Steven Moffat (screenplay by), Edgar Wright (screenplay by), Joe Cornish (screenplay by)
Actors: Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis, Daniel Craig, Nick Frost
Plot: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 21 wins & 60 nominations.
